title: Explain increase in Si conductivity - P vs Ge

content.prompt: Silicon crystals are semiconductors. Which of the following is a correct reason for the increase in the conductivity of Si crystals when a small fraction of Si atoms are replaced with those of a different element?

choices.label: P atoms introduce additional mobile negative charges.
P atoms introduce additional mobile positive charges.
Ge atoms have more electrons than Si atoms have.
Ge atoms are much smaller than Si atoms.

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
